actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 170 - 158 (Record Vote No: 67).
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A concurrent resolution providing for a conditional adjournment of the House from March 25 to April 8, and a conditional adjournment of the Senate from March 26 or March 27 to April 8, 1986.

summary.text: Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from March 25, 1986, until April 8, 1986, and of the Senate from March 26 or 27, 1986, until April 8, 1986.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for a conditional adjournment of the House from March 25 to April 8, and a conditional adjournment of the Senate from March 26 or March 27 to April 8, 1986.
